start.text: We shall give them a thrashing!
All hands, prepare for boarding actions.
Oh dear, the vagabonds wish to dance.

start_boss.text: Affix bayonets gentlemen! Prepare for a proper scrap.
Oh dear, I don't believe they're going to talk reasonably about this....

retreat.text: Even Hannibal had his low points... I will return!

out_of_missiles.text: I dare say, I believe I'm out of missiles.
That clunk informs me to the fact that we're out of missiles.
The audacity of these knaves to be still standing after all of that!

need_help.text: Not a favorable situation for me lads, a bit of help please?
I'm in a spot of bother right now, assistance is now paramount to my survival.

engaged.text: I don't wish to kill you my friend! But alas, money is a fine incentive.

pursuing.text: Engage them! Quick as you can!
Flank speed! And don't spare the horses.

running.text: Goodbye my friends, I wish you the best of luck.
The shoe is on the other foot I dare say...

hull_90.text: That only hurt my pride, they shall pay.
Don't knock over the wine you barbarians!

hull_50.text: Hmmm, not a great place to be in, no?
Alas, they may actually pose a threat.
Multiple hull breaches! Nothing new I suppose.

hull_30.text: Oh dear, my mortality is becoming quite apparent.
I have not yet begun to fight!
Oh dear, death is not on my agenda for today.

overload.text: What a splendid array of colors!
Perhaps the enemy will be honorable enough to not take advantage?

death.text: I shall rest under the shade of those trees...
A true Captain will go down with his vessel!

victory.text: I knew we'd triumph over those barbarians!
